pkgmetadata.longdescription: QtPy is a small abstraction layer that lets you write applications using a single API call to either PyQt or PySide. It provides support for PyQt6, PyQt5 and PySide6. Basically, you can write your code as if you were using PyQt6 but import Qt modules from qtpy instead of PyQt6 (or PySide6)
